channel.title: Frameworks on LightJason
channel.description: Recent content in Frameworks on LightJason

item.title: AgentSpeak(L++) Component
item.description: This is the main component with the agent functionality. The component allows to build agents from the ASL script and contains all built-in actions.

item.title: Framework
item.description: The multi-agent framework is split up into different parts. Each component is provided with separate documentation. In this section, we give an overview of all framework elements. The whole framework is published at Maven Central.
